sections.heading: What are Question Words?
sections.content:
Question words (疑問詞 - gimonshi) are used to ask for specific information. Japanese has equivalents for the English 5W1H: Who, What, When, Where, Why, and How.

何 (なに/なん) - What 誰 (だれ) - Who いつ - When どこ - Where なぜ/どうして - Why どう/どのように - How

children.heading: 何 (nani/nan) - What
children.content: 何ですか？ "What is it?" 何を食べますか？ "What do you eat?" 何時ですか？ "What time is it?"

children.heading: 誰 (dare) - Who
children.content: 誰ですか？ "Who is it?" 誰が来ますか？ "Who will come?" 誰と行きますか？ "Who will you go with?"

children.heading: いつ (itsu) - When
children.content: いつですか？ "When is it?" いつ行きますか？ "When will you go?" いつ来ましたか？ "When did you come?"

children.heading: どこ (doko) - Where
children.content: どこですか？ "Where is it?" どこに行きますか？ "Where will you go?" どこから来ましたか？ "Where did you come from?"

children.heading: なぜ/どうして (naze/doushite) - Why
children.content: なぜですか？ "Why is it?" どうして来なかったの？ "Why didn't you come?" なぜ勉強しますか？ "Why do you study?"

children.heading: どう (dou) - How
children.content: どうですか？ "How is it?" どうやって行きますか？ "How do you go?" 日本語はどうですか？ "How is your Japanese?"

children.heading: どのくらい/どれくらい - How much/long
children.content: どのくらいかかりますか？ "How long does it take?" どれくらい勉強しますか？ "How much do you study?"

children.heading: いくら (ikura) - How much (price)
children.content: いくらですか？ "How much is it?" 全部でいくらですか？ "How much is everything?"

children.heading: いくつ (ikutsu) - How many/How old
children.content: いくつありますか？ "How many are there?" いくつですか？ "How old are you?" (casual)

children.heading: どんな (donna) - What kind of
children.content: どんな食べ物が好きですか？ "What kind of food do you like?" どんな人ですか？ "What kind of person is he/she?"

children.heading: どの (dono) - Which
children.content: どの本ですか？ "Which book is it?" どれですか？ "Which one is it?"

children.heading: どちら (dochira) - Which (of two)
children.content: どちらがいいですか？ "Which is better?" どちらから来ましたか？ "Where are you from?" (polite)

sections.heading: Question Word Placement
sections.content:
Question words typically go where the answer would be :

Question: 誰が来ますか？ "Who will come?" Answer: 田中さんが来ます "Tanaka will come" Question: 何を食べますか？ "What will you eat?" Answer: 寿司を食べます "I'll eat sushi"

sections.heading: With Particles
sections.content: Question words combine with particles naturally:

children.heading: が (subject)
children.content: 誰が言いましたか？ "Who said it?" 何がほしいですか？ "What do you want?"

children.heading: を (object)
children.content: 何を食べますか？ "What do you eat?" 誰を待っていますか？ "Who are you waiting for?"

children.heading: に (direction/time)
children.content: どこに行きますか？ "Where are you going?" 誰に会いますか？ "Who will you meet?"

children.heading: で (location/means)
children.content: どこで買いましたか？ "Where did you buy it?" 何で来ますか？ "How (by what means) will you come?"

children.heading: と (with)
children.content: 誰と行きますか？ "Who will you go with?" 何と言いましたか？ "What did you say?"

children.heading: から (from)
children.content: どこから来ましたか？ "Where did you come from?" 誰から聞きましたか？ "Who did you hear it from?"

children.heading: Basic Information
children.content: 名前は何ですか？ "What is your name?" どこに住んでいますか？ "Where do you live?" いつ来ましたか？ "When did you come?"

children.heading: Preferences
children.content: 何が好きですか？ "What do you like?" どんな音楽が好きですか？ "What kind of music do you like?" どれがいいですか？ "Which is good?"

children.heading: Plans and Actions
children.content: 今日何をしますか？ "What will you do today?" いつ行きますか？ "When will you go?" 誰と行きますか？ "Who will you go with?"

children.heading: Casual
children.content: 何？ - What? 誰？ - Who? いつ？ - When? どこ？ - Where?

children.heading: Polite
children.content: 何ですか？ - What is it? 誰ですか？ - Who is it? いつですか？ - When is it? どこですか？ - Where is it?

children.heading: Very Polite
children.content: 何でしょうか？ - What might it be? どちらですか？ - Which is it? (polite) いつでしょうか？ - When might it be?

sections.heading: Multiple Question Words
sections.content:
You can use multiple question words in one sentence:

誰がいつどこに行きますか？ "Who will go where when?" 何をどこで買いますか？ "What will you buy where?"

children.heading: Example 1: First Meeting
children.content: A: お名前は何ですか？ "What is your name?" B: 田中です "I'm Tanaka" A: どこから来ましたか？ "Where are you from?" B: 東京から来ました "I came from Tokyo"

children.heading: Example 2: Making Plans
children.content: A: 週末何をしますか？ "What will you do on the weekend?" B: 映画を見に行きます "I'll go to see a movie" A: 誰と行きますか？ "Who will you go with?" B: 友達と行きます "I'll go with a friend"

children.heading: Example 3: Shopping
children.content: A: これはいくらですか？ "How much is this?" B: 1000円です "It's 1000 yen" A: どこで作りましたか？ "Where was it made?" B: 日本で作りました "It was made in Japan"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Wrong particle
children.content: Wrong: 誰を来ますか？ ❌ Right: 誰が来ますか？ ✓ "Who will come?"

children.heading: Mistake 2: Using か in casual speech
children.content: Casual context: 何食べる？ ✓ (no か) "What will you eat?" Polite: 何を食べますか？ ✓ "What will you eat?"

children.heading: Mistake 3: Wrong form of 何
children.content: Before です or counter: 何 (なん) 何ですか？ (なんですか) Before を, が: 何 (なに) 何を食べる？ (なにを)

sections.heading: Question Word Summary
sections.content: Who: 誰 (だれ) What: 何 (なに/なん) When: いつ Where: どこ Why: なぜ/どうして How: どう/どのように Which: どれ/どの/どちら What kind: どんな How much (price): いくら How much/long: どのくらい How many/old: いくつ

sections.heading: Practice Sentences
sections.content: 何を食べますか？ "What will you eat?" 誰が来ますか？ "Who will come?" いつ行きますか？ "When will you go?" どこに住んでいますか？ "Where do you live?" なぜ勉強しますか？ "Why do you study?" どう行きますか？ "How will you go?" いくらですか？ "How much is it?" どのくらいかかりますか？ "How long does it take?"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: 何 (nani/nan) - What (detailed) 誰 (dare) - Who (detailed) いつ (itsu) - When (detailed) どこ (doko) - Where (detailed) なぜ/どうして - Why (detailed) どう (dou) - How (detailed) か (ka) - Question particle Yes/No Questions - Question formation
